fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.solar_panel

Class SolarPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.solar_panel.SolarPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, SolarPanelImplementationI

    public class SolarPanel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements SolarPanelImplementationI
    The class SolarPanel

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       nominalPowerProductionCapacity != null && nominalPowerProductionCapacity.getData() > 0.0 && nominalPowerProductionCapacity.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)

    Invariants

     invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       CAPACITY_PER_SQUARE_METER != null && CAPACITY_PER_SQUARE_METER.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       STANDARD_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !STANDARD_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       FAKE_CURRENT_POWER_PRODUCTION != null && FAKE_CURRENT_POWER_PRODUCTION.getData() > 0.0 && FAKE_CURRENT_POWER_PRODUCTION.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)

    Created on : 2025-09-26

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Constructor Detail

      • SolarPanel

        protected SolarPanel(int nbOfSquareMeters)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        create a solar panel component with the given number of square meters of panels, a generated URI for its reflection inbound port and the standard URI for the in bound port offering the SolarPanelCI component interface.

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 pre     nbOfSquareMeters > 0
 post    getNominalPowerProductionCapacity().equals(new Measure<Double>(nbOfSquareMeters * CAPACITY_PER_SQUARE_METER.getData(),CAPACITY_PER_SQUARE_METER.getMeasurementUnit()))
        Parameters:
        nbOfSquareMeters - number of square meters of solar panel to be created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • SolarPanel

        protected SolarPanel(java.lang.String reflectionInboundPortURI,
                     java.lang.String inboundPortURI,
                     int nbOfSquareMeters)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        create a solar panel component with the given number of square meters of panels, the given URI for its reflection inbound port and the given URI for the in bound port offering the SolarPanelCI component interface.

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 pre     reflectionInboundPortURI != null
 pre     inboundPortURI != null && !inboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     nbOfSquareMeters > 0
 post    getNominalPowerProductionCapacity().equals(new Measure<Double>(nbOfSquareMeters * CAPACITY_PER_SQUARE_METER.getData(),CAPACITY_PER_SQUARE_METER.getMeasurementUnit()))
        Parameters:
        reflectionInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port offering the ReflectionI interface.
        inboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.
        nbOfSquareMeters - number of square meters of solar panel to be created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
